posts.postText:
Hey,
I was thinking of adding a wiki for NNJG.
What would you guys think of that?
I'm thinking of using it as a place for all of the information about [NNJG] to be stored.
Server information and rules, admin bios, guides to playing(mzp.infernos guide to mayhem, ect.)
That way, if people have a question about anything they can check the wiki for information, and our forums get less cluttered with things like this.

I'd like this, not only because it would be a nice storehouse of information quick to the grab, but also to expand the NNJG influence. ;p
That is... provided the "Northern New Jersy Grotto" doesnt have one already.

>> I'd like this, not only because it would be a nice storehouse of information quick to the grab, but also to expand the NNJG influence. ;p
That is... provided the "Northern New Jersy Grotto" doesnt have one already.â€‰
XD, Made my day.
Any other opinions?
